text.div:
Shigellosis (Tests for Shigella species by Culture and Identification Method)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    17576-0 Shigella sp identified in Unspecified specimen by Organism specific culture
    42255-0 Salmonella and Shigella sp identified in Unspecified specimen by Organism specific culture
    42256-8 Shigella boydii Ag [Presence] in Isolate
    42257-6 Shigella dysenteriae Ag [Presence] in Isolate
    42258-4 Shigella flexneri Ag [Presence] in Isolate
    42259-2 Shigella sonnei Ag [Presence] in Isolate
    43371-4 Salmonella and Shigella sp identified in Stool by Organism specific culture
    46454-5 Shigella sp [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by Organism specific culture
    48806-4 Salmonella sp+Shigella sp+Escherichia coli enterotoxic identified in Stool by Organism specific culture
    49056-5 Shigella sp serotype [Identifier] in Isolate by Agglutination
    82300-5 Shigella sp [Presence] in Stool by Culture
    88586-3 Shigella sp identified in Stool by Organism specific culture
